attributes.review: not much to say because this app is stupid and if you don’t have a strong will you will get manipulated into thinking orange wants the best for you when really he just wants to become a dictator

attributes.review: If I could rate it 0, I would 😻 unfortunately I will not be having this app for very long because I cannot bear to see this cheeto here anymore. I hope this app gets banned ☺️☺️☺️

attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with what trump was doing ( not because I like him) and the app was very disappointing. For the president you think he would have a better app😕
attributes.title: Just isn’t good

attributes.review: Bro this app took forever to download and then it didn’t even work and just glitches out when I tried to open it like ugh I give up

attributes.review: My phone crashed right after downloading the app, and it has lagged my phone ever since. I would give this a zero stars if possible.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: The app hardly functions and crashes constantly. There is no point in using it. Also i hate Donald trump so I hope the app gets deleted.
attributes.title: This app is awful

attributes.review: He tries to make you donate money at every turn. Like calm down bro. Stop praying on people. You have so much wealth already. If I could give this 0 stars I would. It feels like a scam.
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever seen.

attributes.review: this app is a joke to society. you would think the president would have a good app. but the answer is NO. super slow and not even up to date. worse app i’ve ever downloaded.

attributes.review: This app keeps making my phone crash and keeps taking me to ungodly websites, I must say I expected more from the president but clearly he’s immature and not fit for re-election.
attributes.title: Just a review

attributes.review: this app took FIVE DAYS to download and when i tried logging in it said my email didn’t exist !! and then when i FINALLY got in, it locked me out everytime i opened the app. this is a TERRIBLE app and it needs to go😤
attributes.title: TERRIBLEEE!!!
